data.title: Fantastic food, super nice people
data.text: I am a burger aficionado.  I wish I lived near this place.  I would be a regular patron.  There Maria Burger is outstanding.  Huge patty of delicious ground beef with cheese, mushroom, bacon, and all the fixings on a great bun.  I got a big pile fried sweet potatoes on the side.  It all was delicious.  They are so friendly and attentive here.  My wife enjoyed a great salad with chicken.

data.title: Excellent Lunch
data.text: While on a break from jury duty we went to Maria's for lunch. The burgers were great and the service was quick. I will stop by again when I'm not so rushed and try some of the other items.

data.title: Great Hamburgers
data.text: Try the trio hamburgers very good!  Good price good salad different items on the menu.  We will go there again for sure and try other things

data.title: Just right...exactly what we needed
data.text: Driving from Yosemite to San Francisco we were really hungry but had no idea where to get something decent for lunch.  Maria's Burger Bar got great reviews when we did a quick on-line search so we stopped in to this storefront restaurant.  While a burger was the obvious choice and those we saw being served looked amazing and hearty (as in giant size with mounds of toppings and fries), our hearts were set on something a bit lighter and healthier.  My husband ordered the Cobb salad and I opted for a salad topped with grilled chicken, apples, walnuts, blue cheese and such.  Wow, were we glad we stopped in.  The salads were amazing.  Absolutely fresh ingredients and perfectly grilled and herbed chicken.  The restaurant decor is simple and what you'd expect in his location but is was very, very clean as were the restrooms and the service was outstanding.  I would drive back there someday just to try one of those burgers!

data.title: Great burgers, ok atmosphere
data.text:
We picked out this restaurant via the internet and desiring a burger while driving between Fresno (airport) and the coast.  Walking in early on a Friday night (5pm California time but 8pm to our Eastern time bodies), it was hot and we were the only customers.  That worried us a bit but we decided to stick with our choice (there were a few good reviews on Yelp).  

All three of us adults ordered burgers (which came with fries).  Hearty portions, quick and polite service, and good food.  Not fancy by any means and maybe not the cleanest/prettiest place, but it was tasty.  Plenty of options on the menu if not interested in a burger...was sort of a burger and Mexican place rolled into one.  Burgers about $10/each.
